title: Werewolf Audio Pack
description: The Werewolf audio is an audio pack you can use to create the sounds of a werewolf
longDescription:
This is a construction pack that includes numerous audio files for creating sounds of a Werewolf

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Bones Breaking
  • Gore sounds
  • Clothes Ripping Sound
  • Paw Swipes
  • Footstep Sounds
  • Vocalization


Number of Audio Waves: 169

Number of Audio Cues: 169

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz 24Bit)

Do Sound FX loop: (Some of Them Do)

Minutes of audio provided: 7:03

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes: NONE
